div.p: The Medication List document aims to fully comprise the current medication of a patient. It consists of Medication Treatment Plan, Medication Prescription, Medication Dispense and Pharmaceutical Advice entries.

div.li: IHE Pharmacy Profil: PML (Pharmacy Medication List)

div.p: This exchange format is defined as a document type that corresponds to a Bundle as a FHIR resource. A Bundle has alist of entries. The first entry is the Composition, in which all contained entries are then referenced.
